actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-838.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4300) to entitle employees to parental leave in cases involving the birth, adoption, or serious health condition of a son or daughter and temporary medical leave in cases involving inability to work because of a serious health condition, with adequate protection of the employees' employment and benefit rights, and to establish a commission to study ways of providing salary replacement for employees who take any such leave.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4300 (employee parental and medical leave).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4300) to entitle employees to parental leave in cases involving the birth, adoption, or serious health condition of a son or daughter and temporary medical leave in cases involving inability to work because of a serious health condition, with adequate protection of the employees' employment and benefit rights, and to establish a commission to study ways of providing salary replacement for employees who take any such leave.
